i18n.NoPoLineTip: Please navigate to a POLINE record.
i18n.UpdateDesc: POL Post Correction will create new POL,and then cancel the current POL.
i18n.UpdateConfirm: Do you want to cancel Current POLINE,and create a new POLine?
i18n.rebuildorupdateerrortip: This collection field is not available, please rebuild it !
i18n.updatebt: Update：Get Title number subfield and update Call-no subfield,if Title number subfield already exists, Only Update Call-no subfield.
i18n.tip1: Please setting field  and subfield when first use.
i18n.tip2: Click Rebuild,according the setting cover all field
i18n.tip3: Click Update,according the setting get Title number subfield and generate Call-no subfield
